Three Month Plan to Learn #Mathematics Behind #MachineLearning. #BigData #Analytics #DataScience  #IoT #IIoT #Python #RStats #TensorFlow #JavaScript #ReactJS #CloudComputing #Serverless #DataScientist #Linux #Mathematics #Programming #Coding #100DaysofCode

I asked @danrobinson why cryptocurrency Twitter is so weird and combative. Him:

"Imagine data science Twitter, except that if #JuliaLang  beats out #rstats then everyone who ever used it becomes a millionaire"

Ok...my sister showed me these palettes from the @USFWS Instagram and they are unburlliiiievably beautiful. Who has made the R package? I beg of you! 😭🎨🐟🏕🏞 @NatlParkService #rstats https://t.co/l6DmCVYSZQ

New #rstats blog post: "The many flavours of missing values" where I discuss the variants of {NA} - {NA_character_} and friends, and how this comes up with {dplyr::if_else} and {dplyr::case_when}
  https://t.co/wghuttnZ0G

Today, I had a chance to share the joy of working in R with data volunteers at @COVID19Tracking. A question came up that I’d love help answering from #rstats community: 

“What resources would you suggest for someone new to R + the #tidyverse?” 

Slides: https://t.co/ijSLNhMc5F https://t.co/FsqNfNXL5F

Introducing our new book, Tidy Modeling with R  {https://t.co/JjCKm7NbBA} #rstats #DataScience
Good thread. #rstats is super useful but we need to help people transition from e.g. SPSS rather than elitist "It's R way or the highway" mentality. https://t.co/4KXCXf20Ha

#rstats - 📔 Remember we wrote an online book to help you build a production-grade Shiny application along with {golem} in 5 steps: 
✍️ Design
📊 Prototype
🏗️ Build
💪 Strengthen
🌍 Deploy

👉 https://t.co/wLEFo8whUB https://t.co/Zm7ZtZDa3s
